title: It works
comment: If you were addicted to Tombo, surely you missed its encrypt/decrypt features on android. Now you're not!
Great software! I'm using it with Dropbox/dropsync and tombo pc client.

title: Brilliant
comment: After years of using Tombo, this makes my android device useful. For those of us who live our lives in text files this is superb.

title: Just bit more
comment: Would you please consider allow to change font color in edit mode? Thanks hard work!

title: AWESOME! Perfect with rsync on your own server. In
comment: AWESOME! Perfect with rsync on your own server. Integrates with win32 Tombo.

title: Finally!!!
comment: I have searched high and low for a simple notepad app with safe permissions, saves with encryption and has search capability. I use steganos locknote on my pc and all my passwords are stored 2gether in it. If I need a password I can search through the text for the site by name. Text files are ubiquitous and easily transferred between devices. Who needs silly password managers that force you to enter each password individually into entry forms and save the data in proprietary formats.

title: Great!
comment: Just what I needed for renaming and opening  txt files.

title: Killer app!
comment: Fantastic app! Great for organizing text notes. I sync with Tomboy on my PC using dropsync, and it's perfect!! Thank you for making such a great app available! Highly, highly recommended.

title: The one missing thing to make Android useful
comment: If you organize your whole life with Tombo (like I do) you definitely need this app. A big thanks to the author. Regarding synching, I suggest you try to encourage the author of MyPhoneExplorer to add two-way file synchronization. Then we would have an easy solution. Until then you can activate USB storage and use a Windows synchronization tool like SyncToy or Synkron.

title: Sense update 7-11-11 keyboard does not show.
comment: after 7-11-11 update the keyboard does not show up on updating or creating files!!
Great app for who as me uses tombo notes. Need a sugestion to keep notes sync with desktop.
